Name: doc
Notes / Example: Set by module. External layout set 'o' to compatibility with Odoo reports

Name: doc_opts.payment_term_position
Notes / Example: May be Auto, None, on Footer or on Header - With auto, when due payment is whole in one date, all datas are printed on header otherwise  - all datas are printed on footer - Odoo print only Payment Term notes on Footer

Name: o
Notes / Example: Alias used in invoice print set by external layout
